title: Christ with the Centurion
marks: Date and Label LLC, lightly incised (?): [(illegible) 1632]
description: figures in a landscape; Christ at left wearing blue garment, accompanied by five figures in various colored robes; three men, including one man wearing vest of armor, kneeling at center before Christ; man in vest of armor with sword, wearing red cape with white fur lining at right, seated on horseback, accompanied by seated dog; standing armored soldier behind kneeling figures; other standing figures and horse; foliage at left
